name: WormTris
overview: Released on Amiga Format issue 99, July 1997, coverdisk 99B. Wormtris is a Tetris clone from JBSoft Software Development released in 1997. The game only features the one mode so it's simply a high score based game. The difference in this one is worms, sheep, UFO's and other things fall and can aid or hinder you as you play.
